testsuite.name: com.bhumi.SampleMaven.AutomationTests.TC06
testsuite.system-out: Entering UserName & Password and login to salesforce data is entered in username textbox data is entered in password textbox login button is clicked Login Successfull SalesForce User Menu button is clicked SalesForce User Menu Drop Down options verified My Profile Menu button is clicked My Profile Page displayed after clicking My Profile Menu Edit button is clicked Edit Profile button is clicked Edit Profile pop up displayed after clicking Edit Profile button About Me button is clicked About Tab on Edit Profile pop up button is clicked Last Name field is cleared data is entered in Last Name Field textbox Save on Edit Profile pop up button is clicked text is extracted from Last Name on My Profile page Last Name updated from edit profile popup Post Comment button is clicked Send Post Comment button is clicked data is entered in Send Post Comment Text textbox Share Post button is clicked text is extracted from Feed Text Feed Text Verified User File button is clicked User File Upload button is clicked data is entered in Upload File textbox Share Post button is clicked Uploaded File is Verified Upload Photo button is clicked data is entered in Photo Path textbox Save Photo Button button is clicked
